snippet: Argentine President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner never had thyroid cancer despite being diagnosed with the disease last month, her spokesman said on Saturday.
abstract: Argentine government announces that previous reports of President Cristina Fernandez de Kirchner having thyroid cancer were false, following examination of her thyroid gland that found no cancerous cells.
lead_paragraph: Argentine President Cristina Fernández de Kirchner never had thyroid cancer despite being diagnosed with the disease last month, her spokesman said on Saturday.

headline.seo: No Thyroid Cancer Found in President Kirchner of Argentina
headline.main: Argentine Leader Is Told Thyroid Was Cancer-Free
headline.print_headline: Argentine Leader Is Told Thyroid Was Cancer-Free
